entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is the one who cried 'Back to lunch with you' and raised her wand. She is described as being in charge of the office.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who gave Umbridge a few seconds' start before hurrying after her to see what was causing the uproar. He has a 'very shrewd idea' of who set off the fireworks.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is mentioned as being called by Umbridge, suggesting that Potter and Harry are likely the same person.

relationships.description: Umbridge calls out 'Back to lunch with you, Potter!' indicating that she is addressing Potter directly.
Harry gives Umbridge a few seconds' start before hurrying after her to see what was causing the uproar, indicating that he is following her.
